ISSUE.TITLE: [now-cli] Error: Command failed: taskkill /pid 1044 /T /F
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Sentry Issue: [NOW-CLI-5GB](https://sentry.io/organizations/zeithq/issues/1292401504/?referrer=github_integration) ``` Error: Command failed: taskkill /pid 1044 /T /F ERROR: The process "1044" not found. File "child_process.js", line 295, in ChildProcess.exithandler File "events.js", line 210, in ChildProcess.emit File "domain.js", line 476, in ChildProcess.EventEmitter.emit File "internal/child_process.js", line 1021, in maybeClose File "internal/child_process.js", line 430, in Socket.<anonymous> ... (3 additional frame(s) were not displayed) ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-client] Add `apiUrl` support (#3168) This PR adds support for `apiUrl` option to `now-client` as well as a test for it

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-cli] Don't throw if builder child process can not be killed The Sentry error reports that the process has already been killed, so no need to throw in this case. Fixes #3191.
[now-cli] Don't throw if builder child process can not be killed (#3192) The Sentry error reports that the process has already been killed, so no need to throw in this case. Fixes #3191.
